grid.scratchThatSquare: Scratch this square with the mouse to discover the explanation!

about.title: About us
about.subtitle: IncluCard is a micro-learning solution that allows you to raise awareness in a quick, fun and effective way!
about.how: Go through the different boxes to be untouchable after your participation in this inclusive quiz.
about.howSubtitle: Once logged in, click on the desired answer. Each correct answer earns you 50 points. You can find your score by clicking on the "score" section of the menu. Then scratch the top insert to discover the explanation of the answer!
